auth.options.description: A hash of method-specific authentication options. This often includes Client ID/Secrets and endpoints.

auth.type.description: The authentication method to use (github, google, http, uaa)

certauths._hugo_example_raw:

    certificate: |
      -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
      MIIDHjCCAgagAwIBAgIRALdnV+vn5/gr4KTP1vyYCjAwDQYJKoZIhvcNAQELBQAw

      -----END CERTIFICATE-----
    private_key: |
      -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
      MIIEogIBAAKCAQEAv7H0Ed7PnPpU4rrT7b83TlEzV6fdxDHLEh7pSX1xQPfNeSsy

certauths.description: An array of certificate authorities and their configurations.

enable_client_downloads.description: True to publish file downloads of the client binaries.

enable_ui.description: True to enable a simple browser landing page for users.

env.banner.description: A banner message or notice that users may find useful.

env.metadata.description: A simple hash of string key-value pairs which is opaque to the server.

env.name.description: A recommended environment name that users may find useful.

env.title.description: A friendly human environment name that users may find useful.

env.url.description: The externally accessible URL for this service.

openvpn_service_link.options.certauth.description: The certificate authority used for signing by the openvpn service (only applies when using the openvpn link)

openvpn_service_link.options.validity.description: The validity of certificates signed by the openvpn service (only applies when using the openvpn link)

openvpn_service_link.require.description: An array of authentication requirements for the openvpn service (only applies when using the openvpn link)

server.certificate.description: A PEM-formatted certificate for the server.

server.host.description: The bind address for the listening server

server.port.description: The bind port for the listening server

server.private_key.description: A PEM-formatted private key for the server.

server.redirect.auth_failure.description: A redirect URL for users who have just failed to authenticate.

server.redirect.auth_success.description: A redirect URL for users who have just authenticated successfully.

server.redirect.root.description: A redirect URL for users directly accessing the server root.

server.robotstxt.description: A custom robots.txt document for the server to provide.

server.trusted_proxies.description: A list of proxy IPs or CIDRs to trust when detecting remote client IPs.

services._hugo_example_raw:
- options:
    target:
      host: 192.0.2.1
      user: vcap
  require:
  - remote_ip:
      within: 192.0.2.0/24
  - scope:
      present: example/admin
  type: ssh
services.description: An array of signing services and their configurations.
